## parseAs() function

Factory function to create a value parser based on defined data type and type hints

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function parseAs(type?: DataType, hints?: TypeHints): Value;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | DataType | <i>(Optional)</i> the datatype to interperet as |
|  hints | TypeHints | <i>(Optional)</i> type hinting information |

<b>Returns:</b>

Value

A parsed value
